revised_title: Circumstances of Transits of Venus in 2004 and 2012
tldr: The author calculates the circumstances of the transits of Venus over the sun's disk in the years 2004 and 2012, using M. Leverrier's Tables of the Sun and Planet. The results indicate that the entire transit will be visible at Greenwich in 2004, while only the egress will be visible at Greenwich in 2012.
